FFSLevel0.title: 【FireFox 微渲染】
FFSLevel0.value: /* FireFox 阴影 微渲染 */*/*[[PlayershadowSwitch]]*/{text-shadow: 0 0 0.1px rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;}/

FFSLevel2.title: 【FireFox 中渲染】
FFSLevel2.value: /* FireFox 阴影 中渲染 */*/*[[PlayershadowSwitch]]*/{text-shadow: 0 0 0.5px rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;}/

GCSLevel0.title: 【Chrome 微渲染】
GCSLevel0.value: /* Chrome 阴影 微渲染 */*/*[[PlayershadowSwitch]]*/{text-shadow: 0 0 0.01em rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;}/

GCSLevel2.title: 【Chrome 中渲染】
GCSLevel2.value: /* Chrome 阴影 中渲染 */*/*[[PlayershadowSwitch]]*/{text-shadow: 0 0 0.05em rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;}/

FRESLevel0.title: 【所有浏览器 微渲染】
FRESLevel0.value: /* Font Rendering Enhancer 阴影 微渲染 */*/*[[PlayershadowSwitch]]*/{text-shadow: transparent 0px 0px 0px, rgba(0,0,0,0.3) 0px 0px 0px !important;}/

FRESLevel1.title: 【所有浏览器 轻渲染】
FRESLevel1.value: /* Font Rendering Enhancer 阴影 轻渲染 */*/*[[PlayershadowSwitch]]*/{text-shadow: transparent 0px 0px 0px, rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 0px 0px 0px !important;}/

FRESLevel2.title: 【所有浏览器 中渲染】
FRESLevel2.value: /* Font Rendering Enhancer 阴影 中渲染 */*/*[[PlayershadowSwitch]]*/{text-shadow: transparent 0px 0px 0px, rgba(0,0,0,0.7) 0px 0px 0px !important;}/

FRESLevel3.title: 【所有浏览器 重渲染】
FRESLevel3.value: /* Font Rendering Enhancer 阴影 重渲染 */*/*[[PlayershadowSwitch]]*/{text-shadow: transparent 0px 0px 0px, rgba(0,0,0,1) 0px 0px 0px !important;}/

css.code:
/* CodeMirror */BODY>div.CodeMirror>div.CodeMirror-scroll{font-family: "Source Code Pro","Anonymous Pro","Envy Code R","Inconsolata","mononoki","Consolas","Menlo","Monaco","DejaVu Sans Mono","Liberation Mono","Nimbus Roman No9 L","Times New Roman","Courier New","Microsoft YaHei UI","Microsoft YaHei","Microsoft JhengHei UI","Microsoft JhengHei","SimHei","SimSun","KaiTi","WenQuanYi Micro Hei","WenQuanYi Zen Hei","Hiragino Sans GB" !important;font-size:14px !important;line-height:15pt !important;}
/* Orion */#clientDiv>DIV , #clientDiv>DIV>SPAN , .rulerLines.odd , .rulerLines.even{font-family: "Source Code Pro","Anonymous Pro","Envy Code R","Inconsolata","mononoki","Consolas","Menlo","Monaco","DejaVu Sans Mono","Liberation Mono","Nimbus Roman No9 L","Times New Roman","Courier New","Microsoft YaHei UI","Microsoft YaHei","Microsoft JhengHei UI","Microsoft JhengHei","SimHei","SimSun","KaiTi","WenQuanYi Micro Hei","WenQuanYi Zen Hei","Hiragino Sans GB" !important;font-size:14px !important;line-height:15pt !important;}

sections.code:
/* CodeMirror */BODY>div.CodeMirror>div.CodeMirror-scroll{font-family: "Source Code Pro","Anonymous Pro","Envy Code R","Inconsolata","mononoki","Consolas","Menlo","Monaco","DejaVu Sans Mono","Liberation Mono","Nimbus Roman No9 L","Times New Roman","Courier New","Microsoft YaHei UI","Microsoft YaHei","Microsoft JhengHei UI","Microsoft JhengHei","SimHei","SimSun","KaiTi","WenQuanYi Micro Hei","WenQuanYi Zen Hei","Hiragino Sans GB" !important;font-size:14px !important;line-height:15pt !important;}
/* Orion */#clientDiv>DIV , #clientDiv>DIV>SPAN , .rulerLines.odd , .rulerLines.even{font-family: "Source Code Pro","Anonymous Pro","Envy Code R","Inconsolata","mononoki","Consolas","Menlo","Monaco","DejaVu Sans Mono","Liberation Mono","Nimbus Roman No9 L","Times New Roman","Courier New","Microsoft YaHei UI","Microsoft YaHei","Microsoft JhengHei UI","Microsoft JhengHei","SimHei","SimSun","KaiTi","WenQuanYi Micro Hei","WenQuanYi Zen Hei","Hiragino Sans GB" !important;font-size:14px !important;line-height:15pt !important;}
